pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:5.1: 74. The training rule on less than twelve years
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:6.2: At that time nuns who had less than twelve years of seniority gave the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:6.3: They were ignorant and incompetent, and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:6.4: And their students, too, were ignorant and incompetent,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:6.5: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:7.3: “How can nuns who have less than twelve years of seniority give the full ordination?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:7.7: How can nuns who have less than twelve years of seniority give the full ordination?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:8.1: ‘If a nun who has less than twelve years of seniority gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:10.1: Who has less than twelve years of seniority:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:10.2: who has not reached twelve years of seniority.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:12.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:12.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:12.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:12.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:12.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:13.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:14.1: The fourth training rule is finished.
